definition: to join a political party (esp. the Communist Party)
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: When did your brother join the Party ? -Two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 你的弟弟是什么时候入党的？二年前。

sentences.english: He is the applicant for Party membership.
He joins the Communist Party and gets involved in local politics, growing more distant from his family.
sentences.chinese: 入党后的他开始参与政治活动，与家人逐渐疏离。

sentences.english: Never shall I forget the day when I join the party.
sentences.chinese: 我永远不会忘记我入党的那天。

sentences.english: I wanna apply for Party membership this semester.
sentences.chinese: 我这学期想要入党申请。

sentences.english: Many of our local Party branches are still reluctant to let intellectuals join.
sentences.chinese: 许多地方党部，还不愿意吸收知识分子入党。

sentences.english: A group of higher or middle rank intellectuals have been admitted into the Party.
sentences.chinese: 一批优秀的高中级知识分子被吸收入党。

sentences.english: Do you think he will not join the Party?
Applicants for Party membership must go through the procedure for admission individually.
sentences.chinese: 申请入党的人，必须个别履行入党手续。

sentences.english: Applicants for Party membership must go through the procedure for admission individually.
sentences.chinese: 申请入党的人，必须个别履行入党手续。

sentences.english: This week, a few robots join the party.
sentences.chinese: 这个星期，一些机器人入党。

sentences.english: She also got into trouble when she turned down a man's petition to join the Party.
sentences.chinese: 她自己也惹上麻烦，因为她不同意某人入党。

sentences.english: A number of young teachers have joined the Party.
We'll never forget the day when we joined the Party.
sentences.chinese: 我们久远不会忘怀我们入党的那一天。

sentences.english: Every applicant for Party membership must undergo the admission procedure individually.
sentences.chinese: 所有申请入党的人，必须个别地履行入党手续。

definition: to enroll in the Communist Youth League
to rise through the ranks (as a party cadre)
to withdraw from a political party
to leave a political party/to give up party membership

pinyin: Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2

definition: Communist Party/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3]
to serve in the army/to be a soldier
